headline: No Progress on Rules for an Impeachment Trial
abstract: On the first day of a new legislative session, Senate leaders indicated they had made no progress in resolving their logjam over how to proceed.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Senate leaders wrangled on Friday over the terms of President Trump’s impeachment trial, deepening their impasse and throwing the start date further into doubt amid disputes over whether to call witnesses or introduce documentary evidence.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
